name: 理論地球物理學
description: 地球物理學是研究地球的物理行為、活動、及機制的學門，在這門課你將學到地球物理領域近年來最熱門的科學問題、為回答這些問題所使用的方法，及這些方法論的應用價值。
goals: 學生經由報告和討論，訓練自己獨立思考、理解地球物理現象的背後物理意義，並尋求和其他學科的結合。
經由分組英文口頭報告和書面報告，訓練學生溝通、合作、組織的技巧。
討論迷思問題，經由歷史地震的構造背景、地震學意義、和社會衝擊進行探究
syllabus:
Lecture 1. Course introduction and general introduction to geophysics

Lecture 2. Selfintro research interestts

Lecture 3. Earth's interior

Lecture 4. Mineral Physics: Phase Transitions and Mineralogy of the Upper Mantle

Lecture 5. Mineral Physics: Trace Elements and Hydrogen in the Earth's Transition Zone and Lower Mantle

Lecture 6. Mineral Physics: Diffusion, Viscosity and Melt rhelolgy

Lecture 7. Crustal and Lithosphere Dynamics: Plate Tectonics 

Lecture 8. Crustal and Lithosphere Dynamics: Plate Rheology and Mechanics

Lecture 9. Crustal and Lithosphere Dynamics: Heat Flow and Thermal Structure of the Lithosphere

Lecture 10. Crustal and Lithosphere Dynamics: Magmatism, Magma, and Magma Chambers

Lecture 11. Mantle Dynamics: Temperatures, Heat, and Energy in the Mantle of the Earth

Lecture 12. Mantle Dynamics: The Generation of Plate Tectonics from Mantle Dynamics

Lecture 13. Mantle Geochemical Geodynamics

Lecture 14. Mantle Geochemical Geodynamics

Lecture 15. Topic paper presentation and discussion

Lecture 16 Topic paper presentation and discussion

Lecture 17. Topic paper presentation and discussion

Lecture 18. Final
